tool_description: This API compares two face images to determine if they belong to the same person, aiding in authentication and impersonation detection.

api_list.name: Facematch by URL
api_list.description: Compare two faces and decide whether they are from the same person using image URLs.

api_list.name: Facematch by Base64
api_list.description: Compare two faces and decide whether they are from the same person using Base64 encoded images.
